content: off loosely i suggest just a simple knit bind off being careful not to tug on your yarn but if you are a tight knitter you may want to use a stretchier method such as jenny s surprisingly stretchy bind off soak in cold water with wool wash and block at 22 inches wide by 30 inches long enjoy your baby blanket #sleepyowlsbabyblanket 10 of 14 marie-elyse dugal designs charts leaves
